analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MultiStageCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#574-580):
	External calls:
	- stage = updateCurrentStage() (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#575-576)
	- stage.proxyBuyTokens.value(msg.value)(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#576-578)
	- updateCurrentStage() (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- stage.proxyBuyTokens.value(msg.value)(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#576-578)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStageIndex (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol)

Reentrancy in MultiStageCrowdsale.addStageCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#560-574):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(stageToBeAdded.previousStage() != address(0)) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#566)
	- require(bool)(stageToBeAdded.openingTime() >= lastStage.closingTime()) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#569-572)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stages (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#572-573)

Reentrancy in StageCrowdsale.isPreviousStageFinalized (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#519-529):
	External calls:
	- previousStage.isFinalized() (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#524-528)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- previousStageIsFinalized (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#526-528)

Reentrancy in MultiStageCrowdsale.updateCurrentStage (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol):
	External calls:
	- currentStage.isFinalized() && currentStageIndex + 1 < stages.length (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStageIndex (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#301-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#304-305)

MultiStageCrowdsale.updateCurrentStage has external calls inside a loop:
	- currentStage.isFinalized() && currentStageIndex + 1 < stages.length (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol)

Reentrancy in StageCrowdsale.proxyBuyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#495-519):
	External calls:
	- _preValidatePurchase(_beneficiary,weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#500)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#505-507)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#382-391) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#386)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#396-407) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/17/0x4b0d055bb267082d992d856ff7ec4d6a13cc4fc7.sol#402-407)
